uRepo.org Repository uRepo.org is an indepent repository designed to be as simple as possible to use by users and developers who wish to upload Add-ons to a 3rd party website. We generally follow the same rules as the official Kodi repository and encourage developers to submit to that as well.

all Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi. Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
